knimeNode.name: Loop End
knimeNode.shortDescription: Node at the end of a loop

fullDescription.intro: The LoopEnd is the node that end a loop that is executed a predefined number of times. At the start of the loop you need LoopStart, where you can defined how many times the loop should be executed. All nodes in between are executed that many times.

ports.outPort: Collected results from the loop body
